content:
This is probably simple, but ./x.py tests -h is not helpful for figuring it out. Two questions:

1) How can I run only a particular subset of tests in library/core or library/std? None of the following work:

  • ./x.py test library/core/result.rs - path to file
  • ./x.py test library/core -- result - trying to pass a module path to cargo test? idk

2) How can I see the test names of tests as they run? All I see is green dots and it's not obvious which option makes the output more verbose (--verbose, oddly enough, does not help)
